The peanut is often (i) _________ referred to as a nut; (ii) _________ to such people, it is actually a legume.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) archaically
(D) unbeknownst
(B) erroneously
(E) abhorrent
(C) deftly
(F) consanguineous
